fields.label: Body
fields.value: Primo's vision is to enable the next generation of developers and DIYers to code beautiful and powerful websites. Primo believes in approachable technology, no more complicated frameworks or rigid and limited site builders, primo is the middle of the road tool that is accessible enough for entry-level web development and powerful enough to enable lots of creating custom solutions.
